name: Battlewise Valor
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: It's never good to walk into an ambush, but with the right spell you might walk out again.

name: Cavalry Pegasus
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Cavalry Pegasus attacks, each attacking Human gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"It is hope, hooved and winged."
—Cymede, queen of Akros

name: Celestial Archon
oracle_text: Bestow {5}{W}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Flying, first strike
Enchanted creature gets +4/+4 and has flying and first strike.

name: Chained to the Rocks
oracle_text: Enchant Mountain you control
When Chained to the Rocks enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Chained to the Rocks leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

name: Chosen by Heliod
oracle_text: Enchant creature
When Chosen by Heliod enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2.
flavor_text:
"Training and studies aid a soldier in meager amounts. The gods do the rest."
—Brigone, soldier of Meletis

name: Dauntless Onslaught
oracle_text: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The people of Akros must learn from our leonin adversaries. If we match their staunch ferocity with our superior faith, we cannot fail."
—Cymede, queen of Akros

name: Decorated Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
{1}{W}: Prevent the next 1 combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn.
flavor_text: The awards and medals of polis-dwellers mean nothing to griffins, but they repay acts of generosity.

name: Divine Verdict
oracle_text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: The last thing to go through the cyclops's mind was a twelve-ton block of marble.

name: Elspeth, Sun's Champion
oracle_text: +1: Put three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.
−3: Destroy all creatures with power 4 or greater.
−7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have flying."

name: Ephara's Warden
oracle_text: {T}: Tap target creature with power 3 or less.
flavor_text: "When you threaten the sanctity of the polis, you insult Ephara herself. If she doesn't smite you, I will."

name: Evangel of Heliod
oracle_text: When Evangel of Heliod enters the battlefield, put a number of 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield equal to your devotion to white. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)

name: Fabled Hero
oracle_text: Double strike
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Fabled Hero, put a +1/+1 counter on Fabled Hero.
flavor_text: "You. Poet. Be sure to write this down."

name: Favored Hoplite
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Favored Hoplite, put a +1/+1 counter on Favored Hoplite and prevent all damage that would be dealt to it this turn.

name: Gift of Immortality
oracle_text: Enchant creature

When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. Return Gift of Immortality to the battlefield attached to that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Glare of Heresy
oracle_text: Exile target white permanent.
flavor_text: No foe is more hated than the former friend.

name: Gods Willing
oracle_text: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: Honor the gods of Theros, and they will return the favor.

name: Heliod, God of the Sun
oracle_text: Indestructible
As long as your devotion to white is less than five, Heliod isn't a creature. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)
Other creatures you control have vigilance.
{2}{W}{W}: Put a 2/1 white Cleric enchantment creature token onto the battlefield.

name: Heliod's Emissary
oracle_text: Bestow {6}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Whenever Heliod's Emissary or enchanted creature attacks, tap target creature an opponent controls.
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.

name: Hopeful Eidolon
oracle_text: Bestow {3}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has lifelink.

name: Hundred-Handed One
oracle_text: Vigilance
{3}{W}{W}{W}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
As long as Hundred-Handed One is monstrous, it has reach and can block an additional ninety-nine creatures each combat.

name: Lagonna-Band Elder
oracle_text: When Lagonna-Band Elder enters the battlefield, if you control an enchantment, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: "The best lessons are not the ones I teach. They are the ones the pupils realize for themselves."

name: Last Breath
oracle_text: Exile target creature with power 2 or less. Its controller gains 4 life.
flavor_text: In time, all things turn to dust. Some things just take less time.

name: Leonin Snarecaster
oracle_text: When Leonin Snarecaster enters the battlefield, you may tap target creature.
flavor_text: Formerly oppressed by the polis of Meletis, leonin occasionally "mistake" their old enemies for game.

name: Observant Alseid
oracle_text: Bestow {4}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Vigilance
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.

name: Ordeal of Heliod
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Heliod.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Heliod, you gain 10 life.

name: Phalanx Leader
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Phalanx Leader, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
flavor_text: His soldiers etch his words on the insides of their shields, their inspiration always in sight during battle.

name: Ray of Dissolution
oracle_text: Destroy target enchantment. You gain 3 life.
flavor_text: The works of one god last only as long as the patience of another.

name: Scholar of Athreos
oracle_text: {2}{B}: Each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
flavor_text: She asks pointed questions of the dead who wait for Athreos, learning of life from those who are about to leave it.

name: Setessan Battle Priest
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Setessan Battle Priest, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "Your god teaches you only how to kill. Karametra teaches me to defend what I hold dear. That is why I will prevail."

name: Setessan Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
{2}{G}{G}: Setessan Griffin gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavor_text: Most griffins must be caught and broken into the service of the polis. Not so in Setessa, where they volunteer.

name: Silent Artisan
flavor_text:
On the fourth day they passed through a forest of immense stacked stones. Althemone, youngest of the companions, called these pillars the work of a god, but the Champion knew better. She quickened her pace.
—The Theriad

name: Soldier of the Pantheon
oracle_text: Protection from multicolored
Whenever an opponent casts a multicolored spell, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "I hear the gods' voices in my dreams each night, and I offer bloody trophies on their altars each day."

name: Spear of Heliod
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+1.
{1}{W}{W}, {T}: Destroy target creature that dealt damage to you this turn.
flavor_text: Legend speaks of the Sun Spear, the mighty weapon that can strike any point in Theros, even the depths of the Underworld.

name: Traveling Philosopher
flavor_text:
The Champion and the philosopher Olexa returned from the opposing camp at dusk. Behind them, the enemy raised sail and departed, breaking the siege. When asked what the two had done, the Champion replied, "We spoke to them."
—The Theriad

name: Vanquish the Foul
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Wingsteed Rider
oracle_text: Flying
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Wingsteed Rider, put a +1/+1 counter on Wingsteed Rider.
flavor_text: Trust is the only bridle a pegasus will accept.

name: Yoked Ox
flavor_text:
It was in fields of grain, not fields of battle, that the Champion learned to bear the yoke of duty to the gods. She worked the land long before she was called on to defend it.
—The Theriad

name: Annul
oracle_text: Counter target artifact or enchantment spell.
flavor_text:
"Why pray to the gods, who feed on your worship? Dissolve your illusions and see the true nature of things."
—Xenagos, the Reveler

name: Aqueous Form
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked.
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Artisan of Forms
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Artisan of Forms, you may have Artisan of Forms become a copy of target creature and gain this ability.

name: Benthic Giant
oracle_text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text:
"Some fates you can see coming for you, plain as day, and there's nothing you can do about them."
—Callaphe the mariner

name: Bident of Thassa
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
{1}{U}, {T}: Creatures your opponents control attack this turn if able.
flavor_text: The wills of mortals shift as the tide ebbs and flows.

name: Breaching Hippocamp
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Breaching Hippocamp enters the battlefield, untap another target creature you control.
flavor_text: Don't try to ride this steed unless you've got gills too.

name: Coastline Chimera
oracle_text: Flying
{1}{W}: Coastline Chimera can block an additional creature this turn.
flavor_text: Seeing a chimera overhead foretells good fortune, but only because seeing one any closer foretells dismemberment.

name: Crackling Triton
oracle_text: {2}{R}, Sacrifice Crackling Triton: Crackling Triton deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text: He calls upon both the currents in the sea and the current in the clouds.

name: Curse of the Swine
oracle_text: Exile X target creatures. For each creature exiled this way, its controller puts a 2/2 green Boar creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: Another imminent battle subsided in busy snuffling and carefree rooting.

name: Dissolve
oracle_text: Counter target spell. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: "You thought only the gods could stop you?"

name: Fate Foretold
oracle_text: Enchant creature
When Fate Foretold enters the battlefield, draw a card.
When enchanted creature dies, its controller draws a card.
flavor_text: The tale of her life was already written, but that didn't mean she could predict the ending.

name: Gainsay
oracle_text: Counter target blue spell.
flavor_text:
"You dryfolk must take the air for granted. You constantly insist on wasting it."
—Kenessos, priest of Thassa

name: Griptide
oracle_text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text: When the sea god Thassa wishes to speak with a mortal, she does not issue a summons or grant a vision requesting a visit. The sea simply brings her guest before her.

name: Horizon Scholar
oracle_text: Flying
When Horizon Scholar enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Lost in a Labyrinth
oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: Even those who leave the labyrinth never escape it, forever dreaming of their time trapped within.

name: Master of Waves
oracle_text: Protection from red
Elemental creatures you control get +1/+1.

When Master of Waves enters the battlefield, put a number of 1/0 blue Elemental creature tokens onto the battlefield equal to your devotion to blue. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)

name: Meletis Charlatan
oracle_text: {2}{U}, {T}: The controller of target instant or sorcery spell copies it. That player may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor_text: "Every object has an echo in the Æther beyond the world. Every idea has a shadow that can be brought to light."

name: Mnemonic Wall
oracle_text: Defender
When Mnemonic Wall enters the battlefield, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"It augments anamnesis. What is so confusing about that?"
—Perisophia the philosopher

name: Nimbus Naiad
oracle_text: Bestow {4}{U} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Flying
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.

name: Omenspeaker
oracle_text: When Omenspeaker enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor_text: Her prophecies amaze her even as she speaks them.

name: Ordeal of Thassa
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Thassa.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Thassa, draw two cards.

name: Prescient Chimera
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Prognostic Sphinx
oracle_text: Flying
Discard a card: Prognostic Sphinx gains hexproof until end of turn. Tap it.
Whenever Prognostic Sphinx attacks, scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Sea God's Revenge
oracle_text: Return up to three target creatures your opponents control to their owners' hands. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text:
"What has neither mouth nor throat, yet swallows captain, crew, and boat?"
—Sphinx's riddle

name: Sealock Monster
oracle_text: Sealock Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
{5}{U}{U}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Sealock Monster becomes monstrous, target land becomes an Island in addition to its other types.

name: Shipbreaker Kraken
oracle_text: {6}{U}{U}: Monstrosity 4. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put four +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Shipbreaker Kraken becomes monstrous, tap up to four target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps for as long as you control Shipbreaker Kraken.

name: Stymied Hopes
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: When a god's will is against you, the day never ends well.

name: Swan Song
oracle_text: Counter target enchantment, instant, or sorcery spell. Its controller puts a 2/2 blue Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"The most enlightened mages create beauty from violence."
—Medomai the Ageless

name: Thassa, God of the Sea
oracle_text: Indestructible
As long as your devotion to blue is less than five, Thassa isn't a creature. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1.
{1}{U}: Target creature you control can't be blocked this turn.

name: Thassa's Bounty
oracle_text: Draw three cards. Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Was this gift cast adrift for any to find, or did Thassa guide the currents to bring it to me alone?"
—Kenessos, priest of Thassa

name: Thassa's Emissary
oracle_text: Bestow {5}{U} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Whenever Thassa's Emissary or enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.

name: Triton Fortune Hunter
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Triton Fortune Hunter, draw a card.
flavor_text: "Thassa has blessed me with power and insight. I am careful not to disappoint her."

name: Triton Shorethief
flavor_text:
At sunrise, the Champion and her companions awoke to find their supplies gone and Brygus, their sentry, dead. Carefully arranged piles of ornamental shells gave a clear warning: go no further.
—The Theriad

name: Triton Tactics
oracle_text: Up to two target creatures each get +0/+3 until end of turn. Untap those creatures. At this turn's next end of combat, tap each creature that was blocked by one of those creatures this turn and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

name: Vaporkin
oracle_text: Flying
Vaporkin can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text:
"Mists are carefree. They drift where they will, unencumbered by rocks and river beds."
—Thrasios, triton hero

name: Voyage's End
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: Philosophers say those lost at sea ascended to a more perfect realm. Sailors say they drowned.

name: Wavecrash Triton
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Wavecrash Triton, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

name: Abhorrent Overlord
oracle_text: Flying

When Abhorrent Overlord enters the battlefield, put a number of 1/1 black Harpy creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield equal to your devotion to black. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature.

name: Agent of the Fates
oracle_text: Deathtouch
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Agent of the Fates, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text: "You are breathing borrowed air."

name: Asphodel Wanderer
oracle_text: {2}{B}: Regenerate Asphodel Wanderer.
flavor_text: He killed out of hate, so now only hate sustains him. He sought immortality, so the gods gave it to him.

name: Baleful Eidolon
oracle_text: Bestow {4}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has deathtouch.

name: Blood-Toll Harpy
oracle_text: Flying
When Blood-Toll Harpy enters the battlefield, each player loses 1 life.
flavor_text: When harpies demand a toll to cross through their territory, consider yourself lucky if they permit payment in coin.

name: Boon of Erebos
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Regenerate it. You lose 2 life.
flavor_text:
"Death is not a certainty. Erebos determines when a mortal's time is up."
—Iadorna, death priest of Erebos

name: Cavern Lampad
oracle_text: Bestow {5}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has intimidate.

name: Cutthroat Maneuver
oracle_text: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+1 and gain lifelink until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Our ambition drives us forward. Together we will claim what is ours, no matter who holds it."

name: Dark Betrayal
oracle_text: Destroy target black creature.
flavor_text:
"You're just like me: ruthless, cunning, and ambitious. Obviously you're a threat."
—Basarios the Blade

name: Disciple of Phenax
oracle_text: When Disciple of Phenax enters the battlefield, target player reveals a number of cards from his or her hand equal to your devotion to black. You choose one of them. That player discards that card. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

name: Erebos, God of the Dead
oracle_text: Indestructible
As long as your devotion to black is less than five, Erebos isn't a creature. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)
Your opponents can't gain life.
{1}{B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.

name: Erebos's Emissary
oracle_text: Bestow {5}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Discard a creature card: Erebos's Emissary gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If Erebos's Emissary is an Aura, enchanted creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn instead.
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.

name: Felhide Minotaur
flavor_text:
With spear held high, the Champion came to meet Thyrogog of the Ashlands, who wore the old king's skin as a cloak and fed on the flesh of innocents. The foul minotaur raised the great axe called Goremaster and charged.
—The Theriad

name: Fleshmad Steed
oracle_text: Whenever another creature dies, tap Fleshmad Steed.
flavor_text: More disturbing than the unknown is a distortion of the familiar.

name: Gray Merchant of Asphodel
oracle_text: When Gray Merchant of Asphodel enters the battlefield, each opponent loses X life, where X is your devotion to black. You gain life equal to the life lost this way. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

name: Hero's Downfall
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
flavor_text: Destiny exalts a chosen few, but even heroes break.

name: Hythonia the Cruel
oracle_text: Deathtouch
{6}{B}{B}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Hythonia the Cruel becomes monstrous, destroy all non-Gorgon creatures.

name: Insatiable Harpy
oracle_text: Flying, lifelink
flavor_text: Gold coin, battered helmet, broken wrist bone—all have the same value in the eyes of a harpy.

name: Keepsake Gorgon
oracle_text: Deathtouch
{5}{B}{B}: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Keepsake Gorgon becomes monstrous, destroy target non-Gorgon creature an opponent controls.

name: Lash of the Whip
oracle_text: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"No matter who their fickle hearts worship, all mortals belong to one god in the end."
—Iadorna, death priest of Erebos

name: Loathsome Catoblepas
oracle_text: {2}{G}: Loathsome Catoblepas must be blocked this turn if able.
When Loathsome Catoblepas dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

name: March of the Returned
oracle_text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The Returned have no memory of the Underworld or of their former lives. The golden masks they wear are the last gifts of the selves they left behind.

name: Mogis's Marauder
oracle_text: When Mogis's Marauder enters the battlefield, up to X target creatures each gain intimidate and haste until end of turn, where X is your devotion to black. (A creature with intimidate can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it. Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

name: Nighthowler
oracle_text: Bestow {2}{B}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Nighthowler and enchanted creature each get +X/+X, where X is the number of creature cards in all graveyards.

name: Ordeal of Erebos
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Erebos.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Erebos, target player discards two cards.

name: Pharika's Cure
oracle_text: Pharika's Cure deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"The venom cleanses the sickness from your body, but it will not be pleasant, and you may not survive. Pharika's blessings are fickle."
—Solon, acolyte of Pharika

name: Read the Bones
oracle_text: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor_text: The dead know lessons the living haven't learned.

name: Rescue from the Underworld
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast Rescue from the Underworld, sacrifice a creature.
Choose target creature card in your graveyard. Return that card and the sacrificed card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of your next upkeep. Exile Rescue from the Underworld.

name: Returned Centaur
oracle_text: When Returned Centaur enters the battlefield, target player puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
flavor_text: Driven away by his living kin, he wanders mourning through the wilderness, seeking the dead city of Asphodel.

name: Returned Phalanx
oracle_text: Defender
{1}{U}: Returned Phalanx can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
flavor_text: They lived in different nations and fought in different eras, but as the Returned, they link arms as one.

name: Scourgemark
oracle_text: Enchant creature
When Scourgemark enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0.
flavor_text: To members of the cult of Erebos, gold-infused tattoos symbolize the inevitable grasp of the god of death.

name: Sip of Hemlock
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
flavor_text: Conspirators poisoned the oracle not because her visions were wrong, but because they were right.

name: Thoughtseize
oracle_text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.
flavor_text:
"Knowledge is such a burden. Release it. Release all your fears to me."
—Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver

name: Tormented Hero
oracle_text: Tormented Hero enters the battlefield tapped.
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Tormented Hero, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

name: Viper's Kiss
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
flavor_text:
"I could heal a snakebite. Looks like you got bitten by a constellation."
—Aescalos, healer of Pharika

name: Whip of Erebos
oracle_text: Creatures you control have lifelink.

{2}{B}{B}, {T}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. If it would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: Akroan Crusader
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Akroan Crusader, put a 1/1 red Soldier creature token with haste onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: An Akroan soldier's worth is measured by the number of swords raised by his battle cry.

name: Anger of the Gods
oracle_text: Anger of the Gods deals 3 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text: There was no reason to pray. This was already an act of the gods.

name: Arena Athlete
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Arena Athlete, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn.
flavor_text: The Iroan Games award no medals. Athletes vie for a visit from Iroas, god of victory.

name: Borderland Minotaur
flavor_text:
"You have led us to triumph over the forces of Mogis!" said Brygus the Brave, clapping the Champion on the back.
The Champion wiped the sweat and blood from her brow.
"I count eight graves," she said. "Too many to call this a victory."
—The Theriad

name: Boulderfall
oracle_text: Boulderfall deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
flavor_text:
"Defeating the Meletians was not so difficult. I needed only to move a mountain."
—Eocles, oracle of Purphoros

name: Coordinated Assault
oracle_text: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: It's hard to shout "Shields up!" with a javelin in your chest.

name: Deathbellow Raider
oracle_text: Deathbellow Raider attacks each turn if able.
{2}{B}: Regenerate Deathbellow Raider.
flavor_text:
"The temple has been rededicated. It belongs to Mogis now."
—Rastos, disciple of Mogis

name: Demolish
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or land.
flavor_text:
"When fire is shackled to candle and torch, subjected to insignificance, it finds a way to lash out at its masters."
—Vala, disciple of Purphoros

name: Dragon Mantle
oracle_text: Enchant creature
When Dragon Mantle enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

name: Ember Swallower
oracle_text: {5}{R}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Ember Swallower becomes monstrous, each player sacrifices three lands.

name: Fanatic of Mogis
oracle_text: When Fanatic of Mogis enters the battlefield, it deals damage to each opponent equal to your devotion to red. (Each {R} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to red.)

name: Firedrinker Satyr
oracle_text: Whenever Firedrinker Satyr is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you.
{1}{R}: Firedrinker Satyr gets +1/+0 until end of turn and deals 1 damage to you.
flavor_text: Attending a satyr revel requires a high tolerance for pain.

name: Flamespeaker Adept
oracle_text: Whenever you scry, Flamespeaker Adept gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I see your future, mantled in ash."

name: Hammer of Purphoros
oracle_text: Creatures you control have haste.
{2}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a land: Put a 3/3 colorless Golem enchantment artifact creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: All the world is Purphoros's anvil.

name: Ill-Tempered Cyclops
oracle_text: Trample
{5}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
flavor_text: A cyclops has two moods: angry and asleep.

name: Labyrinth Champion
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Labyrinth Champion, Labyrinth Champion deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text: "It used to be a lair. Now it's just a tunnel."

name: Lightning Strike
oracle_text: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text:
"The hand of Keranos can be seen in every rumbling storm cloud. Best not to stand where he points."
—Rakleia of Shrine Peak

name: Magma Jet
oracle_text: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Messenger's Speed
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has trample and haste.
flavor_text:
"He outran arrows. He outran even the archers' insults."
—Bayma, storyteller of Lagonna Band

name: Minotaur Skullcleaver
oracle_text: Haste
When Minotaur Skullcleaver enters the battlefield, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Their only dreams are of full stomachs."
—Kleon the Iron-Booted

name: Ordeal of Purphoros
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Purphoros.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Purphoros, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

name: Peak Eruption
oracle_text: Destroy target Mountain. Peak Eruption deals 3 damage to that land's controller.
flavor_text:
"Early olive buds? A good omen. Flock of crows? Not so good. Mountain exploding? Bad. Very, very bad."
—Hira, street oracle

name: Portent of Betrayal
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Priest of Iroas
oracle_text: {3}{W}, Sacrifice Priest of Iroas: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: "Even my last breath will be a blow struck for Iroas."

name: Purphoros, God of the Forge
oracle_text: Indestructible
As long as your devotion to red is less than five, Purphoros isn't a creature.
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Purphoros deals 2 damage to each opponent.
{2}{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Purphoros's Emissary
oracle_text: Bestow {6}{R} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has menace.

name: Rage of Purphoros
oracle_text: Rage of Purphoros deals 4 damage to target creature. It can't be regenerated this turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Rageblood Shaman
oracle_text: Trample
Other Minotaur creatures you control get +1/+1 and have trample.
flavor_text:
"I see a spark of pure rage. Soon that spark will spread from the depths of Kragma. Soon its fire will engulf the polis."
—Hira, street oracle

name: Satyr Rambler
oracle_text: Trample
flavor_text: A satyr is bound by nothing—not home, not family, not loyalty.

name: Spark Jolt
oracle_text: Spark Jolt deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: Acolytes of Purphoros hammer the world until they see the sparks of change.

name: Spearpoint Oread
oracle_text: Bestow {5}{R} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
First strike
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has first strike.

name: Stoneshock Giant
oracle_text: {6}{R}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Stoneshock Giant becomes monstrous, creatures without flying your opponents control can't block this turn.

name: Stormbreath Dragon
oracle_text: Flying, haste, protection from white
{5}{R}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Stormbreath Dragon becomes monstrous, it deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

name: Titan of Eternal Fire
oracle_text: Each Human creature you control has "{R}, {T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player."
flavor_text: There is no gift more precious or more perilous than fire.

name: Titan's Strength
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Two-Headed Cerberus
oracle_text: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor_text: The left head keeps the right head starved as motivation to track new prey.

name: Wild Celebrants
oracle_text: When Wild Celebrants enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: "You can tell something's really valuable by the sound it makes when you slam your staff into it."

name: Agent of Horizons
oracle_text: {2}{U}: Agent of Horizons can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: The light in the woods just before dawn reveals a glimmering network of branches, roots, and spiderwebs. The acolytes of Kruphix walk this lattice unseen.

name: Anthousa, Setessan Hero
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Anthousa, Setessan Hero, up to three target lands you control each become 2/2 Warrior creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.
flavor_text: The warriors she leads can rarely keep pace with her, and neither can the tales.

name: Arbor Colossus
oracle_text: Reach
{3}{G}{G}{G}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Arbor Colossus becomes monstrous, destroy target creature with flying an opponent controls.

name: Artisan's Sorrow
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor_text: Some seers read bones or entrails. Others just like to break things.

name: Boon Satyr
oracle_text: Flash
Bestow {3}{G}{G} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Enchanted creature gets +4/+2.

name: Bow of Nylea
oracle_text: Attacking creatures you control have deathtouch.
{1}{G}, {T}: Choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
• Bow of Nylea deals 2 damage to target creature with flying.
• You gain 3 life.
• Put up to four target cards from your graveyard on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Centaur Battlemaster
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Centaur Battlemaster, put three +1/+1 counters on Centaur Battlemaster.
flavor_text:
"A herd is only as strong as its weakest. Our weakest just killed his third minotaur raider—today."
—Braulios of Pheres Band

name: Commune with the Gods
oracle_text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or enchantment card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
flavor_text: For the first time in many years, Elspeth asked for help.

name: Defend the Hearth
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to players this turn.
flavor_text: The defenders said not a word. Their shields, spears, and stances were warning enough.

name: Fade into Antiquity
oracle_text: Exile target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"Are the gods angry at our discontent with what they give us, or jealous that we made a thing they cannot?"
—Kleon the Iron-Booted

name: Feral Invocation
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
flavor_text: Nylea's sacred lynx guards those who honor the Nessian Wood and hunts those who don't.

name: Hunt the Hunter
oracle_text: Target green creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. It fights target green creature an opponent controls.
flavor_text:
"A grudge is a tattoo worn on the inside."
—Setessan warrior saying

name: Karametra's Acolyte
oracle_text: {T}: Add an amount of {G} to your mana pool equal to your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)
flavor_text: "The wilds are a garden tended by divine hands."

name: Leafcrown Dryad
oracle_text: Bestow {3}{G} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Reach
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has reach.

name: Mistcutter Hydra
oracle_text: Mistcutter Hydra can't be countered.
Haste, protection from blue
Mistcutter Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Nemesis of Mortals
oracle_text: Nemesis of Mortals costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard.
{7}{G}{G}: Monstrosity 5. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each creature card in your graveyard. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put five +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

name: Nessian Asp
oracle_text: Reach
{6}{G}: Monstrosity 4. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put four +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
flavor_text: It's not the two heads you should fear. It's the four fangs.

name: Nessian Courser
flavor_text:
Khestes the Adamant, the Champion's closest ally among the centaurs, took one stone to his shoulder and another to his flank. He held his stride and his aim, and let fly the arrow that killed the giant Grinthax.
—The Theriad

name: Nylea, God of the Hunt
oracle_text: Indestructible
As long as your devotion to green is less than five, Nylea isn't a creature. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)
Other creatures you control have trample.
{3}{G}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Nylea's Disciple
oracle_text: When Nylea's Disciple enters the battlefield, you gain life equal to your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)

name: Nylea's Emissary
oracle_text: Bestow {5}{G} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Trample
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has trample.

name: Nylea's Presence
oracle_text: Enchant land
When Nylea's Presence enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted land is every basic land type in addition to its other types.

name: Ordeal of Nylea
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Nylea.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Nylea, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

name: Pheres-Band Centaurs
flavor_text:
"Poets speak of your unrivaled speed," the Champion said to the assembled centaurs, "but it is plain to see that your true strength lies in your unwavering loyalty to one another."
—The Theriad

name: Polukranos, World Eater
oracle_text: {X}{X}{G}: Monstrosity X. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

When Polukranos, World Eater becomes monstrous, it deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures your opponents control. Each of those creatures deals damage equal to its power to Polukranos.

name: Reverent Hunter
oracle_text: When Reverent Hunter enters the battlefield, put a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)

name: Satyr Hedonist
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice Satyr Hedonist: Add {R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.
flavor_text: "Any festival you can walk away from wasn't worth attending in the first place."

name: Satyr Piper
oracle_text: {3}{G}: Target creature must be blocked this turn if able.
flavor_text:
"When I asked my commander the reward for killing that prancing nuisance, he told me, ‘None! I want to kill him myself!'"
—Phrogas, soldier of Akros

name: Savage Surge
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Untap that creature.
flavor_text:
"I thought its back was turned!"
"A centaur has two backs!"

name: Sedge Scorpion
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text:
Thakolides the Mighty
Slayer of minotaurs
Vanquisher of giants
Killed by a scorpion
—Inscription on an Akroan grave

name: Shredding Winds
oracle_text: Shredding Winds deals 7 damage to target creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"Enemies of the wood! Your presence here is a slap in Nylea's face. Do not be surprised if she slaps back."
—Telphe, druid of Nylea

name: Staunch-Hearted Warrior
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Staunch-Hearted Warrior, put two +1/+1 counters on Staunch-Hearted Warrior.
flavor_text: As soon as she faces a monster, she begins composing its epitaph.

name: Sylvan Caryatid
oracle_text: Defender, hexproof
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
flavor_text: Those who enter the copse never leave. They find peace there and take root, becoming part of the ever-growing grove.

name: Time to Feed
oracle_text: Choose target creature an opponent controls. When that creature dies this turn, you gain 3 life. Target creature you control fights that creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

name: Voyaging Satyr
oracle_text: {T}: Untap target land.
flavor_text: "None can own the land's bounty. The gods made this world for all to share its riches. And I'm not just saying that because you caught me stealing your fruit."

name: Vulpine Goliath
oracle_text: Trample
flavor_text:
"With a diet of hydras, giants, and massive serpents, anything would get that big."
—Corisande, Setessan hunter

name: Warriors' Lesson
oracle_text: Until end of turn, up to two target creatures you control each gain "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card."
flavor_text:
"Let each challenge make you a better warrior."
—Anthousa of Setessa

name: Akroan Hoplite
oracle_text: Whenever Akroan Hoplite attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures you control.
flavor_text: "Fair fight? How could it be a fair fight? We're Akroans. They're not."

name: Anax and Cymede
oracle_text: First strike, vigilance
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Anax and Cymede, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: Akros's greatest heroes are also its royalty.

name: Ashen Rider
oracle_text: Flying
When Ashen Rider enters the battlefield or dies, exile target permanent.
flavor_text: One offering to appease her on her arrival. Another to celebrate her departure.

name: Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver
oracle_text: +2: Exile the top three cards of target opponent's library.
−X: Put a creature card with converted mana cost X exiled with Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a Nightmare in addition to its other types.
−10: Exile all cards from all opponents' hands and graveyards.

name: Battlewise Hoplite
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Battlewise Hoplite, put a +1/+1 counter on Battlewise Hoplite, then scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Chronicler of Heroes
oracle_text: When Chronicler of Heroes enters the battlefield, draw a card if you control a creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: She paints pictures with words, though not all pictures show the truth.

name: Daxos of Meletis
oracle_text: Daxos of Meletis can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.

Whenever Daxos of Meletis deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library. You gain life equal to that card's converted mana cost. Until end of turn, you may cast that card and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.

name: Destructive Revelry
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Destructive Revelry deals 2 damage to that permanent's controller.
flavor_text:
"Stoke a fire hot enough and you'll never run out of things to burn."
—Xenagos, the Reveler

name: Fleecemane Lion
oracle_text: {3}{G}{W}: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.)
As long as Fleecemane Lion is monstrous, it has hexproof and indestructible.

name: Horizon Chimera
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying, trample
Whenever you draw a card, you gain 1 life.

name: Kragma Warcaller
oracle_text: Minotaur creatures you control have haste.
Whenever a Minotaur you control attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A warcaller merely brings the herd together. After that, the meat-hunger is all the encouragement they need.

name: Medomai the Ageless
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Medomai the Ageless deals combat damage to a player, take an extra turn after this one.
Medomai the Ageless can't attack during extra turns.

name: Pharika's Mender
oracle_text: When Pharika's Mender enters the battlefield, you may return target creature or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "The direst venom becomes a panacea under Pharika's guidance. I bring it to the worthy, clinging at the edge of the abyss."

name: Polis Crusher
oracle_text: Trample, protection from enchantments
{4}{R}{G}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
Whenever Polis Crusher deals combat damage to a player, if Polis Crusher is monstrous, destroy target enchantment that player controls.

name: Prophet of Kruphix
oracle_text: Untap all creatures and lands you control during each other player's untap step.
You may cast creature spells as though they had flash.
flavor_text: "Time is fluid as a dance, and truth as fleeting."

name: Psychic Intrusion
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from that player's graveyard or hand and exile it. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

name: Reaper of the Wilds
oracle_text: Whenever another creature dies, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{B}: Reaper of the Wilds gains deathtouch until end of turn.
{1}{G}: Reaper of the Wilds gains hexproof until end of turn.

name: Sentry of the Underworld
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
{W}{B}, Pay 3 life: Regenerate Sentry of the Underworld.
flavor_text: When Athreos gathers the newly dead to be ferried across the Five Rivers That Ring the World, he sends skeletal griffins to fetch those who stray.

name: Shipwreck Singer
oracle_text: Flying
{1}{U}: Target creature an opponent controls attacks this turn if able.
{1}{B}, {T}: Attacking creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Her melody melds death and beauty with such artistry that even the gods weep to hear it.

name: Spellheart Chimera
oracle_text: Flying, trample
Spellheart Chimera's power is equal to the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text: Thaumaturges remain silent around chimeras, lest their words conjure even stranger beasts.

name: Steam Augury
oracle_text: Reveal the top five cards of your library and separate them into two piles. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put that pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
flavor_text: Keranos is a fickle god, delivering punishment as readily as prophecy.

name: Triad of Fates
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Put a fate counter on another target creature.
{W}, {T}: Exile target creature that has a fate counter on it, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
{B}, {T}: Exile target creature that has a fate counter on it. Its controller draws two cards.

name: Tymaret, the Murder King
oracle_text: {1}{R}, Sacrifice another creature: Tymaret, the Murder King deals 2 damage to target player.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return Tymaret from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: His memories remained in the Underworld, but his cruelty crossed the Rivers with him.

name: Underworld Cerberus
oracle_text: Underworld Cerberus can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.
Cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities.
When Underworld Cerberus dies, exile it and each player returns all creature cards from his or her graveyard to his or her hand.

name: Xenagos, the Reveler
oracle_text: +1: Add X mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G} to your mana pool, where X is the number of creatures you control.
0: Put a 2/2 red and green Satyr creature token with haste onto the battlefield.
−6: Exile the top seven cards of your library. You may put any number of creature and/or land cards from among them onto the battlefield.

name: Akroan Horse
oracle_text: Defender
When Akroan Horse enters the battlefield, an opponent gains control of it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent puts a 1/1 white Soldier creature token onto the battlefield.

name: Anvilwrought Raptor
oracle_text: Flying, first strike
flavor_text:
"I know its lightness, for I have seen it fly. I know its weight, for I have seen it strike."
—Brigone, soldier of Meletis

name: Bronze Sable
flavor_text:
The Champion stood alone between the horde of the Returned and the shrine to Karametra, cutting down scores among hundreds. She would have been overcome if not for the aid of the temple guardians whom Karametra awakened.
—The Theriad

name: Burnished Hart
oracle_text: {3}, Sacrifice Burnished Hart: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Forged by divine hands to wander mortal realms.

name: Colossus of Akros
oracle_text: Defender, indestructible
{10}: Monstrosity 10. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put ten +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
As long as Colossus of Akros is monstrous, it has trample and can attack as though it didn't have defender.

name: Flamecast Wheel
oracle_text: {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Flamecast Wheel: Flamecast Wheel deals 3 damage to target creature.
flavor_text: Beware the gifts of an ill-tempered forge god.

name: Fleetfeather Sandals
oracle_text: Equipped creature has flying and haste.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text:
"The gods gave us no wings to fly, but they gave us an even greater gift: imagination."
—Daxos of Meletis

name: Guardians of Meletis
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
flavor_text: The histories speak of two feuding rulers whose deaths were celebrated and whose monuments symbolized the end of their wars. In truth they were peaceful lovers, their story lost to the ages.

name: Opaline Unicorn
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
flavor_text: Purphoros once loved Nylea, the god of the hunt. His passion inspired his most astounding works of art.

name: Prowler's Helm
oracle_text: Equipped creature can't be blocked except by Walls.
Equip {2}
flavor_text:
"The youths prattle on about heroic deeds, but avoiding the noose is a feat more daring than their entire careers."
—Basarios the Blade

name: Pyxis of Pandemonium
oracle_text: {T}: Each player exiles the top card of his or her library face down.
{7}, {T}, Sacrifice Pyxis of Pandemonium: Each player turns face up all cards he or she owns exiled with Pyxis of Pandemonium, then puts all permanent cards among them onto the battlefield.

name: Traveler's Amulet
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text:
"What we call magic is nothing more than hope crystallized into a destination."
—Perisophia the philosopher

name: Witches' Eye
